00099 #if RKH_TRACE == 1
00100     #if RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING == 1 && ( RKH_EN_STATE_NAME != 1 || RKH_EN_HSM_NAME != 1 )
00101     #error  "rkhcfg.h, When enabling RKH_TRACE and RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING is set to one (1), must be set to one (1) both RKH_EN_STATE_NAME or RKH_EN_HSM_NAME"

00106 #error "rkhcfg.h, Missing RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH: Max. # of hierarchical levels"
00107 #else
00108     #if RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH == 0 || RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH > 8
00109     #error  "rkhcfg.h, RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH must be > 0 and <= 8"
00110     #endif
00111 #endif

00124  *  The following macros and constants are internal to RKH and 
00125  *  the user application should not call it.

00128 #define RKH_REGULAR                     0x80
00129 #define RKH_PSEUDO                      0
00130 #define RKH_TYPE(t,i)                   (t|i)
00131 
00132 #define RKH_BASIC                       RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0    )
00133 #define RKH_COMPOSITE                   RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0x01 )  
00134 #define RKH_CONDITIONAL                 RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x02 )  
00135 #define RKH_JUNCTION                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x04 )  
00136 #define RKH_SHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x08 )  
00137 #define RKH_DHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x10 )

00144 #endif

00253 #if RKH_EN_ENT_HSM_ARG == 1
00254     
00255     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00256 
00257     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00258     {                                           \
00259         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00260             (*(s)->enter)( h );                 \
00261     }
00262 
00263 #else
00264     
00265     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( void );
00266 
00267     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00268     {                                           \
00269         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00270             (*(s)->enter)();                    \
00271     }
00272 
00273 #endif
00274

00293     {                                           \
00294         if( (s)->exit != NULL )                 \
00295             (*(s)->exit)( h );                  \
00296     }
00297 
00298 #else

00300     typedef void ( *RKHEXT_T )( void );

00302     #define rkh_exec_exit( s, h )               \

00306     }

00368 #if RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00369 
00370     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00371     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h, e )
00372 
00373 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 0
00374     
00375     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00376     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( e )
00377 
00378 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00379     
00380     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00381     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h )
00382 
00383 #else
00384     
00385     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( void );
00386     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))()
00387 
00388 #endif

00411 #if RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00412 
00413     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00414     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h, e )
00415     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00416 
00417 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 0
00418     
00419     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00420     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( e )
00421     HUInt rkh_else( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00422 
00423 
00424 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00425     
00426     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00427     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h )
00428     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00429 
00430 #else
00431     
00432     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( void );
00433     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)()
00434     HUInt rkh_else( void );
00435 
00436 #endif
